dataset_id: BOREAS RSS-03 Atmospheric Conditions from a Helicopter-Mounted Sunphotometer
title: BOREAS RSS-03 Atmospheric Conditions from a Helicopter-Mounted Sunphotometer
summary: Contains Helicopter-based measurements of atmospheric conditions acquired during the BOReal Ecosystem-Atmosphere Study (BOREAS) processed to estimates of aerosol optical thickness and atmospheric water vapor.
